description: Defines the User model class in an Entity Framework Core context, representing an application user with authentication details and related notes.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents an application user with authentication data and a collection of notes.

methods.name: Guid User.Id
methods.description: Primary key identifier for the user, initialized with a new GUID.

methods.name: string User.Username
methods.description: Unique username used for login and identification.

methods.name: string User.Email
methods.description: Unique email address of the user.

methods.name: DateTime User.CreatedAtUtc
methods.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was created.

methods.name: DateTime User.UpdatedAtUtc
methods.description: Timestamp indicating the last update time for the user.

methods.name: ICollection<Note> User.Notes
methods.description: Collection of notes associated with the user.
